title: Sound On: Boeing-Airbus Truce, Infrastructure
itunes:title: Sound On: Boeing-Airbus Truce, Infrastructure
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Former Commerce Secretary Carlos Gutierrez, Bloomberg politics contributor Rick Davis, Roger Fisk, Principal at New Day Strategy, and Rep. Gwen Moore, a Democrat representing Wisconsin’s 4th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
